org.apache.archiva.repository

Interface EditableRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventSource, Repository, RepositoryStorage
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    EditableManagedRepository, EditableRemoteRepository, EditableRepositoryGroup
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractManagedRepository, AbstractRemoteRepository, AbstractRepository, AbstractRepositoryGroup, BasicManagedRepository, BasicRemoteRepository, MavenManagedRepository, MavenRemoteRepository, MavenRepositoryGroup

    public interface EditableRepository
extends Repository
    This is the editable part of a repository. Normally a repository should also implement this interface but it is not required. Capabilities and features are a integral part of the implementation and not provided here by the interface. Feature setting methods are provided by the features itself.

    • Method Detail

      • getPrimaryLocale

        Locale getPrimaryLocale()
        Returns the primary locale used for setting the default values for name and description.
        Returns:
        The locale used for name and description when they are not set

      • setName

        void setName(Locale locale,
             String name)
        Sets the name for the given locale
        Parameters:
        locale - the locale for which the name is set
        name - The name value in the language that matches the locale

      • setDescription

        void setDescription(Locale locale,
                    String description)
        Sets the description for the given locale
        Parameters:
        locale - the locale for which the description is set
        description - The description in the language that matches the locale.

      • setLocation

        void setLocation(URI location)
          throws UnsupportedURIException
        Sets the location of the repository. May be a URI that is suitable for the repository implementation. Not all implementations will accept the same URI schemes.
        Parameters:
        location - the location URI
        Throws:
        UnsupportedURIException - if the URI scheme is not supported by the repository type.

      • setBaseUri

        void setBaseUri(URI baseUri)
        Sets the base uri for relative location uris.
        Parameters:

      • addFailoverLocation

        void addFailoverLocation(URI location)
                  throws UnsupportedURIException
        Adds a failover location for the repository.
        Parameters:
        location - The location that should be used as failover.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedURIException - if the URI scheme is not supported by the repository type.

      • removeFailoverLocation

        void removeFailoverLocation(URI location)
        Removes a failover location from the set.
        Parameters:
        location - the location uri to remove

      • clearFailoverLocations

        void clearFailoverLocations()
        Clears the failover location set.

      • setScanned

        void setScanned(boolean scanned)
        Sets the flag for scanning the repository. If true, the repository will be scanned. You have to set the scheduling times, if you set this to true.
        Parameters:
        scanned - if true, the repository is scanned regulary.

      • setSchedulingDefinition

        void setSchedulingDefinition(String cronExpression)
                      throws IllegalArgumentException
        Sets the scheduling definition, that defines the times, when the regular repository jobs are started. The cronExpression must be a valid quartz cron definition.
        Parameters:
        cronExpression - the cron expression.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the cron expression is not valid.
